attributes.action: replace road tax with a charge per litre duty ensuring all road users pay to use transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To replace the existing car tax sytem which is widely abused and replace it with a fairer apportioned direct tax on fuel use.This will ensure that ALL road users pay towards road repairs and not just the law abiding citizens.
In addition it should act as an extra incentive to price out the gas guzzling large engines which contribute more to carbon emissions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
